import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { NgxLoaderSpinnerService } from 'ngx-loader-spinner'; import { UserService } from 'src/services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users.component.css'], }) export class UsersComponent { userList: any = []; constructor( private router: Router, private spinnerService: NgxLoaderSpinnerService, private userService: UserService ) {} ngOnInit() { this.getUserByQuery(); } getUserByQuery() { this.spinnerService.show(); try { this.userService .getUserbyQuery(`_id=${localStorage.getItem('userId')}`) .subscribe( (response: any) => { console.log(`User Data: ${JSON.stringify(response)}`); this.userList = response.body; console.log(`User List: ` + JSON.stringify(this.userList)); this.spinnerService.hide(); }, (err: any) => { console.error(`Error [getUser]: , ${JSON.stringify(err.error)}`); this.spinnerService.hide(); } ); } catch (err: any) { console.error(`Error [getUser]: , ${JSON.stringify(err)}`); this.spinnerService.hide(); } } }
